entry.title: Bolt Hackathon Day 5/30: Spitballing
entry.summary:
Splitting Project Ideas
Project size is leading to large token usage
Creating secondary projects for features/components that are still integrated with supabase (semi-tested, has both worked and not)
Using git urls as json packages (untested)
AG-UI
Import AG-UI github repo using url, failed from npm packages among other things
Will attempt again later.
Mainly looking to make use of the shared layout system
Today Token use: Bolt: .5m (Live token amount, started AI integration) Gemini: 1.7m (Testing creating new projects under same supabase, testing map creator prompts, tested launch page prompt) Total use: Bolt: 5.9m Gemini: 3.6m

Web mimarisi, web uygulamalarƒ±nƒ±n temelini olu≈üturan yapƒ± ve tasarƒ±m ilkelerini kapsar ve uygulamalarƒ±n performansƒ±ndan, √∂l√ßeklenebilirliƒüinden ve genel kullanƒ±cƒ± deneyiminden doƒürudan sorumlu olduƒüu i√ßin son derece √∂nemlidir. Kullanƒ±cƒ±lar artƒ±k sadece statik web sayfalarƒ± deƒüil, etkile≈üimli ve yanƒ±t veren web deneyimleri bekliyorlar. Bu beklentileri kar≈üƒ±lamak i√ßin web mimarisi, geleneksel sunucu tabanlƒ± modelden daha geli≈ümi≈ü mimarilere doƒüru evrim g‚Ä¶

entry.title: [Free Blog Creation] I tried hosting a static site with Obsidian and GitHub Pages!
entry.summary:
Preface
This is the website I created. *It is still under construction. https://takumifujiwaradairy.github.io/my_public_notes/ In this article, I would like to introduce how to publish a static website for free using Obsidian and GitHub Pages. In this article, I will omit detailed explanations of Obsidian and GitHub Pages. For this project, I am using Quartz4 as the static site framework for publishing Obsidian! https://github.com/jackyzha0/quartz Fork it into your own repository. Note that GitHub Pages cannot be used for free unless it is a public repository! Clone your repository locally. $ git clone https://github.com/user-name/obsidian-quartz.git
Add Markdown files under the content directory.
/content/index.md will be the homepage. npx quartz build rm -rf docs && mv public docs git add -A git commit -m ‚Äúrebuild site with index.html‚Äù git push origin main
Running these commands will automatically complete the setup. Set it up so it looks like the screenshot, and you're good to go!
That's a quick overview of the deployment process. There are still more settings to configure, so I'll cover those in another article if I get around to it.

entry.title: üß† How AI Is Revolutionizing Medical Education ‚Äî A Developer‚Äôs Perspective
entry.summary: By: Alireza Minagar, MD, MBA, MS (Bionformatics) software engineer From Cadavers to Code: A New Era of Physician Training Textbooks and lectures Cadaver dissection Weeks-delayed exam feedback But today, AI is shifting that paradigm entirely. Medical education is no longer a static, one-size-fits-all journey. It‚Äôs becoming adaptive, immersive, and developer-powered. The AI-Driven Model Adaptive learning paths tailored to their strengths and weaknesses Real-time feedback on clinical decisions Dynamic patient simulations that evolve based on learner input These aren‚Äôt just digital flashcards. They‚Äôre full-blown AI-powered experiences designed to mimic the complexity of real-world healthcare ‚Äî without putting a single patient at risk. Simulating Smarter Scenarios Large Language Models (LLMs) are now being used to simulate realistic conversations with patients: Delivering bad news Managing emotionally charged reactions Navigating cultural and linguistic nuances Behind the Scenes: Developer Technologies Powering the Shift Tech Function Combine this with VR, and you‚Äôve got physicians rehearsing high-stakes procedures in immersive, AI-guided simulations. Real Results ‚Äî and Real Responsibility Faster learners More diagnostic-savvy Comfortable using tech as a clinical ally But with innovation comes challenge: Maintaining the human touch in care Protecting student and patient data Ensuring access across socioeconomic lines Let‚Äôs Build the Future of Medicine If you're a developer interested in AI, edtech, or healthcare innovation, this is your moment. Build the platforms. Train the models. Write the APIs. The next generation of doctors depends on what we ship today. Let‚Äôs code the next generation of healers.

entry.title: How to Talk to AI (and Get Better Results)
entry.summary:
Summary
Introduction Context First Example Second Example Third Example This short article aims to help beginner and curious users understand a simple approach to using AI effectively. First of all, I'm not an AI expert, just someone who's curious about it and wants to help others make use of it. I'm doing this for fun, but I hope it ends up being helpful to someone out there! Most sources emphasize that you need to provide context when asking AI questions to get accurate answers. However, what many don‚Äôt mention is that you can actually ask the AI itself what context or background information you should include to improve the quality of its response. This way, even if you‚Äôre unsure what details are relevant, the AI can guide you on how to frame your request for the best possible resul‚Ä¶

entry.title: The Bold Sweetness of a Raspberry Background
entry.summary: Looking for a background that blends energy with elegance? A raspberry background strikes the perfect balance. Raspberry is a rich, vibrant hue‚Äîdeeper than pink, livelier than red, and with just enough sweetness to feel playful without losing its sophistication. It‚Äôs a color that turns heads while still feeling polished, making it ideal for bold, expressive designs that want to feel confident and current. Raspberry captures attention, but with charm. It‚Äôs a color that communicates passion, creativity, and personality. A raspberry background adds visual richness, giving your content a dynamic feel while remaining approachable and warm. It‚Äôs especially effective when you want to feel fresh and fun‚Äîbut still refined. - Beauty & Fashion Brands: Raspberry adds a sense of bold femininity‚Äîperfect for cosmetics, clothing, or accessories. - Event Promotions: Great for vibrant celebrations like galas, birthdays, or themed parties. - Social Media Content: Scroll-stopping and full of energy, it makes quotes, promos, and visuals pop instantly. - Modern Print Design: Whether it‚Äôs a flyer, packaging, or a digital invite, raspberry gives it life and style. To enhance its richness: Use white or light gray for clean, legible contrast. Add gold or rose gold accents for a luxurious touch. Pair with deep navy, plum, or black for a dramatic, high-contrast effect. Combine with peach or blush tones for a softer, layered palette. A raspberry background is bold, juicy, and packed with personality. It‚Äôs perfect when you want your visuals to feel passionate, lively, and modern. Whether you‚Äôre branding a product, designing an event, or crafting content, raspberry adds a splash of stylish energy that‚Äôs hard to ignore. Sweet, strong, and endlessly versatile‚Äîraspberry is color done right.

entry.title: Reflex√µes Noturnas: Por que ‚ÄúTeam Topologies‚Äù me fez repensar tudo sobre como a gente trabalha (e entrega valor)
entry.summary: Hoje, depois de um dia puxado, me peguei pensando nos pontos que mais me marcaram do livro Team Topologies, do Matthew Skelton e Manuel Pais. J√° tinha ouvido muita gente recomendando, mas confesso: s√≥ agora lendo com calma entendi o real impacto disso na nossa forma de trabalhar. E olha‚Ä¶ como Tech Lead, foi imposs√≠vel n√£o revisitar cada decis√£o de estrutura que j√° ajudei a desenhar. Sempre acreditei que tecnologia √© meio, n√£o fim. Mas o livro mostra que como a gente organiza os times importa tanto quanto a stack ou a arquitetura. Sabe aquela hist√≥ria da Inverse Conway Maneuver? De projetar a estrutura pensando na arquitetura que voc√™ quer alcan√ßar e n√£o aceitar que a arquitetura reflete os silos que existem? Isso ficou martelando na minha cabe√ßa. Comecei a pensar no meu time. Nas depend√™nc‚Ä¶

entry.title: The Deep Sophistication of a Plum Background
entry.summary: Looking to create a mood that feels luxurious, mysterious, and timeless? A plum background delivers exactly that‚Äîand more. Plum is a deep, rich hue that blends the regal tones of purple with the warmth of red. It‚Äôs bold without being brash, moody without feeling cold. A plum background adds depth, drama, and a sense of refined elegance to any design, making it a favorite among creatives who want to leave a lasting impression. Plum symbolizes creativity, confidence, and quiet power. It‚Äôs often associated with sophistication, depth, and emotional intelligence. Unlike brighter purples or pinks, plum feels grounded‚Äîit holds weight, visually and emotionally. Using a plum background in your design says: this isn‚Äôt just beautiful‚Äîit‚Äôs intentional. - Luxury Branding: Ideal for high-end fashion, cosmetics, or boutique labels looking to convey richness and exclusivity. - Event Invitations & Stationery: Perfect for evening weddings, galas, or autumn events where you want elegance with a touch of drama. - Web Design & Portfolios: Makes visuals pop while keeping the tone sophisticated and creative. - Social Media Graphics: Adds mood and mystery to quotes, promotions, or storytelling content. To elevate your plum palette: Pair with gold, brass, or rose gold for a regal, upscale look. Use ivory or pale gray for soft contrast and readability. Add blush pink or dusty rose for a romantic, layered tone. Mix with forest green or navy for a rich, dramatic combo. A plum background is more than just a dark color‚Äîit‚Äôs a design statement. It adds mood, weight, and style in one stroke. Whether you're building a brand, crafting a presentation, or designing social content, plum brings a sense of polish that never feels overdone. Understated. Bold. Timeless. That‚Äôs the power of plum.

entry.title: The Vibrant Blend of a Pink Orange Background
entry.summary: Looking for a background that‚Äôs bursting with personality? A pink orange background is your perfect match. This playful color combination fuses the fun, flirty vibe of pink with the bold, sunny energy of orange. The result? A background that feels upbeat, modern, and full of life. Whether you‚Äôre designing for digital or print, a pink orange background adds instant warmth and visual excitement. Pink brings charm and creativity. Orange adds confidence and vibrancy. Together, they create a lively and emotionally rich palette that feels youthful yet stylish. A pink orange background grabs attention‚Äîbut it does it with joy, not force. This makes it ideal for brands and creatives who want to stand out with positivity and flair. - Social Media Graphics: Perfect for eye-catching posts, stories, and ads that pop in a crowded feed. - Event Promotions: From summer parties to pop-up shops, this color combo radiates excitement. - Youthful Branding: Great for fashion, beauty, or lifestyle brands targeting a fun-loving, trend-conscious audience. - Product Packaging: Especially effective for cosmetics, stationery, or food items that want to feel fresh and energetic. To make the most of this bold backdrop: Use white or soft beige for clarity and contrast. Pair with gold or rose gold accents for a luxe, feminine touch. Add mint or turquoise for a vibrant, tropical twist. Use deep plum or navy for balance and a modern edge. A pink orange background isn‚Äôt just colorful‚Äîit‚Äôs expressive. It brings warmth, joy, and movement to your design. Whether you‚Äôre building a brand, sharing a message, or launching a product, this radiant blend makes your visuals feel alive. If your project needs energy, attitude, and a whole lot of color‚Äîpink orange is the way to go.

entry.title: The Soft Boldness of a Pastel Red Background
entry.summary: If you‚Äôre looking for a background that feels both gentle and confident, a pastel red background offers the perfect balance. Pastel red tones down the intensity of classic red, softening it with a milky, airy finish. The result is a color that still carries the warmth and energy of red‚Äîbut with a more welcoming, calming presence. It‚Äôs perfect for designs that want to express emotion without overwhelming the viewer. Red is known for passion, excitement, and urgency. But in its pastel form, it takes on a more thoughtful and tender personality. A pastel red background is approachable, warm, and quietly energetic. It adds charm to your visuals while keeping the mood light and open. This makes it a great choice when you want your design to feel emotionally resonant, but not overpowering. - Lifestyle & Wellness Brands: Perfect for personal care, relationship-focused content, or heartfelt storytelling. - Web Design & Blogs: Adds a warm touch to minimalist designs, giving them subtle personality. - Event Invitations: Ideal for Valentine‚Äôs events, bridal showers, or spring celebrations‚Äîromantic, yet modern. - Social Media Graphics: Stands out without screaming‚Äîgreat for quotes, promos, or announcements with a personal tone. To complement this soft yet bold color: Pair with white or soft gray for a clean, calm look. Use peach, blush, or nude tones for a romantic, tonal palette. Add sage green or muted blue for contrast with a natural vibe. Try rose gold or brass accents to add elegance and warmth. A pastel red background is all about quiet strength. It‚Äôs emotional without being dramatic, colorful without being loud. Whether you‚Äôre designing a brand, sharing a message, or setting a tone‚Äîpastel red adds heart, warmth, and visual appeal. Soft doesn‚Äôt mean weak. With pastel red, you can be bold‚Äîand kind‚Äîall at once.
